name: Corner the Market
text: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait.

name: Develop Weaponry
text: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies.

name: Diversify Research
text: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors.

name: Erect a Monument
text: Spend 8 resources.

name: Expand Borders
text: Control 6 planets in non-home systems.

name: Found Research Outposts
text: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties.

name: Intimidate Council
text: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's system.

name: Lead From the Front
text: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

name: Negotiate Trade Routes
text: Spend 5 trade goods.

name: Sway the Council
text: Spend 8 influence.

name: Amass Wealth
text: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources, and 3 trade goods.

name: Build Defenses
text: Have 4 or more structures.

name: Discover Lost Outposts
text: Control 2 planets that have attachments.

name: Engineer a Marvel
text: Have your flagship or a war sun on the game board.

name: Explore Deep Space
text: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

name: Improve Infrastructure
text: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.

name: Make History
text: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

name: Populate the Outer Rim
text: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

name: Push Boundaries
text: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors.

name: Raise a Fleet
text: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

name: Centralize Galactic Trade
text: Spend 10 trade goods.

name: Conquer the Weak
text: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system.

name: Form Galactic Brain Trust
text: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties.

name: Found a Golden Age
text: Spend 16 resources.

name: Galvanize the People
text: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools.

name: Manipulate Galactic Law
text: Spend 16 influence.

name: Master the Sciences
text: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors.

name: Revolutionize Warfare
text: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies.

name: Subdue the Galaxy
text: Control 11 planets in non-home systems.

name: Unify the Colonies
text: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait.

name: Achieve Supremacy
text: Have your flagship or war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system.

name: Become a Legend
text: Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

name: Command an Armada
text: Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

name: Construct Massive Cities
text: Have 7 or more structures.

name: Control the Borderlands
text: Have units in 5 systems on the edge of the game board other than your home system.

name: Hold Vast Reserves
text: Spend 6 influence, 6 resources, and 6 trade goods.

name: Patrol Vast Territories
text: Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets.

name: Protect the Border
text: Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system.

name: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
text: Control 3 planets that have attachments.

name: Rule Distant Lands
text: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system. [Note: The two planets need to be next to or in TWO seperate players HS.]

name: Don't Corner the Market
text: Control 2 planets of each color (red, blue, green).

name: Don't Develop Weaponry
text: Own a unit upgrade technology and own none of the corresponding unit.

name: Don't Diversify Research
text: Own 3 technologies of 1 color.

name: Don't Erect a Monument
text: Have 10 resources available to spend. Don't spend them.

name: Don't Expand Borders
text: Have two neighbors who own more planets than you.

name: Don't Found Research Outposts
text: Have 3 structures on a planet in your home system.

name: Don't Intimidate the Council
text: Control Mecatol Rex or an adjacent planet but have no ships in that planet's system.

name: Don't Lead from the Front
text: There is a trade good on the Leadership strategy card.

name: Don't Negotiate Trade Routes
text: There is a trade good on the Trade strategy card.

name: Don't Sway the Council
text: There is a trade good on the Politics strategy card.

name: Don't Amass Wealth
text: Own no commodities or trade goods and do not hold your own Trade Agreement promissory note.

name: Don't Build Defenses
text: Own 4 technologies. Own no unit upgrade technologies.

name: Don't Discover Lost Outposts
text: Purge an attachment from a planet you own.

name: Don't Engineer a Marvel
text: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in a system which contains no more than 10 resources' worth of non-fighter ships.

name: Don't Explore Deep Space
text: Every ship you own is in or adjacent to your home system.

name: Don't Improve Infrastructure
text: Destroy a space dock in your home system.

name: Don't Make History
text: Be the first player to pass. You cannot score a stage one public objective this status phase.

name: Don't Populate the Outer Rim
text: Have at least 2 ground forces in empty systems.

name: Don't Push Boundaries
text: Do not hold your own Ceasefire promissory note.

name: Don't Raise a Fleet
text: Own at least as many planets as you have non-fighter ships.

name: Don't Centralize Galactic Trade
text: Everyone has at least one trade good.

name: Don't Conquer the Weak
text: Lose a ground combat to a single defending infantry.

name: Don't Form Galactic Brain Trust
text: Own a non-faction technology for which no one else has the prerequisites.

name: Don't Found a Golden Age
text: ACTION: Embezzle public funds (spend 3 trade goods). Score this objective when you take this component action for a second time in a row.

name: Don't Galvanize the People
text: Have your hero unlocked and unused.

name: Don't Manipulate Galactic Law
text: Give each other player an action card from your hand at random.

name: Don't Master the Sciences
text: Own only bad technologies (a technology is bad if it is cybernetic (yellow), biotic (green) but not a Prophecy of Kings component, warfare (red) but not a Prophecy of Kings component or Assault Cannon, or a unit upgrade but not a faction technology, PDS II, or War Sun).

name: Don't Revolutionize Warfare
text: Win a space combat using only carriers and fighters.

name: Don't Subdue the Galaxy
text: Repatriate all nonhome planets you control (for each ground force on that planet, move it to the space area of that system or destroy it, then return the planet card to the game board).

name: Don't Unify the Colonies
text: Control a planet in a system where another player controls a planet, and control a planet in a system where a second other player controls a planet.

name: Don't Achieve Supremacy
text: Hold an unscored secret objective. You may not score a secret objective this status phase.

name: Don't Become a Legend
text: Have the lowest score.

name: Don't Command an Armada
text: Have 6 non-fighter ships in a system without your command token.

name: Don't Construct Massive Cities
text: Destroy a structure by capturing the planet to which it is attached.

name: Don't Control the Borderlands
text: Own no ship outside your home system.

name: Don't Hold Vast Reserves
text: Resolve a transaction in which you give someone 5 or more total trade goods and commodities, and you receive no trade goods or commodities.

name: Don't Patrol Vast Territories
text: Have ships in 4 systems without your command tokens.

name: Don't Protect the Border
text: Own a space dock with no ships of any color in its system.

name: Don't Reclaim Ancient Monuments
text: Purge 1 cultural, 1 hazardous, and 1 industrial relic fragment you own.

name: Don't Rule Distant Lands
text: Everyone controls all their home system planets.
